thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Andrew

author: Andrew
title: Andrew
text:
Great fare which I couldn't find or match anywhere else, but this fare was nearly ruined by credit card fees. I contacted customer service twice, once by chat, once by phone, and they both said that it shouldn't happen. However, the credit card fee was there, and I couldn't remove it if I paid the way I wanted to.
Thankfully, both customer service officers were extremely polite and friendly whilst I was dealing with them.
